mapper.select: /* MgtBudgetingItemMapper.getBudgetItemList [MgtBudgetingItemMapper.xml] */ SELECT budget_cate_cd , budget_cate_nm from mgt_budget_category mbc where use_yn = 'Y' ORDER by sort_order
SELECT mba.year , mbad.dept_cd from mgt_budget_act mba inner join mgt_budget_act_dept mbad on mba.budget_act_no = mbad.budget_act_no where mba.budget_act_no = #{budgetActNo}

SELECT mbad.budget_act_dept_no , mbadc.budget_act_dept_cate_no , mbad.dept_cd , dbo.GET_DEPT_NM(mbad.dept_cd) as dept_nm , mbadc.budget_cate_cd , mbadc.budget_cate_nm , mbadc.budget_cate_dtl_cd , mbadc.budget_cate_dtl_nm , mbadc.org_amt , mbadc.remark from mgt_budget_act_dept_cate mbadc inner join mgt_budget_act_dept mbad on mbad.budget_act_dept_no = mbadc.budget_act_dept_no INNER join mgt_budget_act mba on mba.budget_act_no = mbad.budget_act_no and mba.budget_act_no = #{budgetActNo}
